      private void sendMessage(Long chatId, String textToSend)
      Creates SendMessage instance for telegram chat with some text and sends it to the chat.

    • checkIfReportMessageEligible

      private void checkIfReportMessageEligible(com.pengrad.telegrambot.model.PhotoSize[] photoSizes, String caption)
      Checks if user's message contains picture and text. If something missed - throw exception.
      Parameters:
      photoSizes - telegram's object represents photo-file from a message
      caption - text field from a message with photo
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - with description which param is null
